description: List features with filtering and pagination.
permissions: No authentication required; feature listing is allowed for anonymous users.
side_effects: If --similar-to-text is provided, the server performs an embedding lookup via OpenAI to compute similarity.
validation_notes: pdca-stage must be one of plan, do, check, act. released-on-min and released-on-max expect dates in YYYY-MM-DD format. differentiation-degree values correspond to integers 1-5 in data. scale values correspond to integers 1-100 in data.

flags.name: --released-on-max
flags.description: Filter to features released on or before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --released-on-min
flags.description: Filter to features released on or after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)

flags.name: --similar-to-text
flags.description: Filter by semantic similarity to text (uses AI embedding search)
